titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Dibromo-5-Dimethylhydantoin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Dibromo-5-Dimethylhydantoin.
